return: The Class object for the bean.

members.name: getCustomizerClass
members.comment: Gets the Class object for the bean's customizer.

return: The Class object for the bean's customizer. This may be null if the bean doesn't have a customizer.

members.comment: Create a BeanDescriptor for a bean that doesn't have a customizer.

param: beanClass - The Class object of the Java class that implements the bean. For example sun.beans.OurButton.class.

members.comment: Create a BeanDescriptor for a bean that has a customizer.

param: beanClass - The Class object of the Java class that implements the bean. For example sun.beans.OurButton.class.
customizerClass - The Class object of the Java class that implements the bean's Customizer. For example sun.beans.OurButtonCustomizer.class.

name: java.beans.BeanDescriptor
comment:
A BeanDescriptor provides global information about a "bean", including its Java class, its displayName, etc.

This is one of the kinds of descriptor returned by a BeanInfo object, which also returns descriptors for properties, method, and events.
